pullrequest.title: Check FSAA support when creating camera render textures

content.raw:
ya so far we haven't heard problems related to it yet so I didn't modify the `RenderEngine` class. We can duplicate this check in `RenderEngine`? 

I was thinking of adding a function in `RenderEngine` to get all fsaa supported values and making use of it in places that we need to set fsaa. This may break ABI so I was thinking of doing this in `gazebo7` or `default` branch
content.html:
ya so far we haven't heard problems related to it yet so I didn't modify the RenderEngine class. We can duplicate this check in RenderEngine?

I was thinking of adding a function in RenderEngine to get all fsaa supported values and making use of it in places that we need to set fsaa. This may break ABI so I was thinking of doing this in gazebo7 or default branch
